item.title: Confirmed! Monkeys Throwing Darts and Bill Gates' Coronavirus Estimates
item.description: Last week I hoped that the Coronavirus pandemic would kill a few horrible ideas. One of those bad ideas involves bowing down before data models as if they were some sort of pagan god. (I should have added to that list the idea of foundations funded by American billionaires.) Data models are not science, but most people have no idea what science is, so they fall prey to this insidious myth.
